channel.title: CVE Feed for LifterLMS -- LMS by LifterLMS – Online Course, Membership & Learning Management System Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LifterLMS -- LMS by LifterLMS – Online Course, Membership & Learning Management System Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24308|2024-08-03T19:28:23.207Z -- lifterlms -- lms%20by%20lifterlms%20%E2%80%93%20online%20course%2C%20membership%20%26%20learning%20management%20system%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The 'State' field of the Edit profile page of the LMS by LifterLMS – Online Course, Membership & Learning Management System Plugin for WordPress plugin before 4.21.1 is not properly sanitised when output in the About section of the profile page, leading to a stored Cross-Site Scripting issue. This could allow low privilege users (such as students) to elevate their privilege via an XSS attack when an admin will view their profile.
